trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element that contains the privacy policy for the WS-Federation binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PrivacyNoticeBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PrivacyNoticeBindingElement"></xref> class from an existing element.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PrivacyNoticeBindingElement"></xref> used to initialize the new element.
Creates a copy of the current binding element.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement"></xref> that is a copy of the current element.
Queries the binding element stack to see whether it supports a particular interface.
Calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> on the next binding element in the binding context.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> for the current binding element.
The interface whose support is being tested.
The interface whose support is being tested.
Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> at which the privacy notice is located.
Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
The version number of the privacy notice.
Exports custom policy assertions regarding the privacy notice from the binding elements that contain the policy.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that contains the binding assertions and elements associated with the policy.
